title: WATCH: Swansea City's Alfie Mawson makes sensational goal-line clearance to deny Leicester City
description: Swansea City earned a precious point at Leicester City on Saturday, but only thanks to Alfie Mawson's sensational goal-line clearance.
content:
With the Swans already trailing 1-0 to Jamie Vardy's 17th-minute opener, Leicester appeared set to double their lead as the ball drop invitingly in the box to striker Kelechi Iheanacho after Lukasz Fabianski had denied Fousseni Diabate with an excellent close-range save.
However, with the goal seemingly at his mercy, the Swansea centre-back somehow prevented Iheanacho from scoring with a brilliant stop on the line that ended up helping the visitors leave the King Power with a draw.
Watch the above video to see the incident
